text: We are running a beta program for anyone who wants to onboard onto <http://smartcodeplatform.com|smartcodeplatform.com> we will give you a 6 month license to be part of our feedback loop.  We automate integration to HubSpot APIs in MuleSoft and Spring Boot Java, inbox me if interested.

I'm currently using the Engagements API in HubSpot to retrieve emails sent through the HubSpot contact page and within the HubSpot account. However, Iâ€™ve noticed that replies sent by contacts from their mobile devices or external email accounts are not being fetched.
Is there a way to capture these replies in HubSpot? If so, could you please share the approach or API endpoints that can help in retrieving those replies?

Hey everyone,

Just following up on my previous post regarding the issue with tracking Google and Facebook leads after the recent API shift. We haven't received any feedback yet and would really appreciate your insights or suggestions on how to resolve this. Has anyone else faced similar issues or found a workaround?

Also, is there a *Discord* community for HubSpot? If so, please let us know.

Thanks in advance for your help!
